label: Task-7
title: Implement CloudFront component class
description: Create app__deploy__aws__cloudfront component class with full lifecycle. CloudFront distribution in front of Lambda Function URLs for CDN caching and custom domain support. Lifecycle: create() distribution with Lambda Function URL as origin, exists(), verify() distribution config and status, lock_down() restrict direct Function URL access, delete() disable then delete distribution, verify_deleted().

properties.acceptance_criteria: CloudFront distribution created pointing to Lambda Function URL. HTTPS works with CloudFront. Direct Function URL access can be restricted. Full lifecycle round-trip works.
